title: Kings of the Dead
description: Note from the Author: "Hello! This may seem like an odd request, but please stop buying this copy of Kings of the Dead. An expanded version of the book has been picked up for publication by Permuted Press and will be available shortly. I would hate for you to purchase this copy only to see an expanded version available shortly after. It takes 6-8 weeks for books to be removed from the Distribution Channel. So as long you see Createspace under the publisher listing, DO NOT BUY IT! Please, buy the version that is currently available from Permuted Press. Thank you." --Tony Faville
author: Tony Faville
